name: Pop! (itch) (stewartkwok)
description:
Goal:

The goal of each round is to get to the target score, which can be set in the menu, as quickly as possible. 

How to Play

Left click to pop the bubbles that your cursor is hovering over. Here are the point values for each color bubble:

  • Red - 5
  • Yellow - 4
  • Blue - 3
  • Green - 2

Additionally, you have two power-ups: Bubble Frenzy and Bubble Bomb. Click on the power-ups to use them; click a second time to place a Bubble Bomb. There is a five-second cooldown on all powerups once any of them are used.

Leaderboard

When you set the target score, the leaderboard also displays the shortest times taken on the device that you are playing on to achieve that score.
